titles.title: The Lord Inhabits The Praises Of His People

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Lord inhabits the praises of His people.
So let's just praise Him.
So let's just praise Him.
The Lord inhabits the praises of His people.
So let's just praise the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sing hallelujah, sing hallelujah,
Sing hallelujah, exalt ye the Lord.
(Repeat.)
